implications of these techniques and how they differ from the original

experiments (9).

New header (similar to existing header)

This section will discuss the importance of protecting individual rights and

freedoms in the face of government secrecy and surveillance. The legacy of

MKUltra serves as a reminder of the dangers of unchecked power and the

need for transparency and accountability (10).
